column5: Ok, so after reading the depressing post on winterizing the boats and motors, I figured I should look into getting the manual for my motor so I know what to do.  I need a manual for a 1977 Johnson 55hp.  Any idea of where I might find one?  Thanks Maureen
there are alot on ebay for around $25 you can even get it on a cd  rob
this is the offical BRP webb site for older manuals  http://www.kencook.com/index.cfm  vance
This might also help you Maureen.  http://www.dixiemarinesales.com/JohnEvinepc.aspx
